lyrics:
11 contributorsmiami lyricsverse 1
the whole truth and nothing but the truth
stop me if youve heard this one before

so long as you dont torture me with my past
lets be honest a secret silenced is a secret safe

chorus
miami miami miami
well every hour on the hour
every hour on the hour
you have to you just have to trust me
whoever i was then
i cant ever be again

verse 2
reminders they are not reluctant
so stop me if youve heard this one before
sideways blinders
i cant find a way around a way around
a way around

chorus
miami miami miami
well every hour on the hour
you have to you just have to trust me
whoever i was then
i cant ever be again
see taking back sunday liveget tickets as low as 26you might also likebridge
the faith you found ive never felt never felt never felt
the terror held in wedding bells
and comfort in theres no one else
the truth be told im never gonna know

chorus
miami miami miami
well every hour on the hour every hour on the hour
unhand me god damn me miami

outro
the terror held in wedding bells
